name: Preternatural Candy Shop
description:
An online project on https://cloudnovel.net/clsond/novel/preternatural-candy-shop is now available to download on itch.io!

The visual novel was created during the Halloween Jam 2018. It is available for free over at CloudNovel (Constant internet connection required and possibly an account on their site to save the game) or help the developer of this game buy a cup of coffee for a minimum of $2 by downloading this game on itch.io here.

Story:

The candy business is not going well but they are making effort to get a positive outcome in the coming festival. However, Mercury tends to make hazardous sweets while Sabrina trying to prevent chaos.

This visual novel does not have the classical 'main menu' and will begin instantly as soon as the application is started.
